titleStmt.title: Directions with prayers and meditations for the worthy receiving the blessed sacrament By the famous Mr. Charles Drelincourt. Minister of the reformed church at Charanton. Out of French.
titleStmt.author: Drelincourt, Charles, 1595-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Abel Swalle at the Unicorn at the west end of St. Pauls, and Samuel Tidmarsh at the Kings Head in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Llp copy tightly bound and cropped with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.
